Question about monsters with type/?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Question about monsters with type/?
By Shrimpy on Friday, November 25, 2005 - 05:07 pm:

Ok monsters that are type/? can the be found in saucer stones found while adventuring,can you make them thro combing? Or must you simply just unlock them thro CD's/DVD's

By Lisa Shock on Friday, November 25, 2005 - 09:46 pm:

You can make them by combining, but one parent needs to be /? type. You can also get them on CD/DVD/game discs.

By Shrimpy on Saturday, November 26, 2005 - 02:38 pm:

ok thanks so your saying like i can take a Dino a Zumm/? and combinin it with say a Phoenix(Phoenix/Phoenix) and maby get a DeathWing(Phoenix/?)?

By VenomousX on Sunday, November 27, 2005 - 11:10 am:

I havent tested it myself, but I'm going to guess that no you wouldnt get a Deathwing. If that was true, getting all the rare monsters would be too easy.

By Shrimpy on Sunday, November 27, 2005 - 04:54 pm:

I was just useing that as an example...I have been testing this with Drividillo's,Goku's,and White Mocchi's and all I have been able to create were Drividillo's,Goku's and White Mocchi's so I think that you can only get what ever monster you use with a /? type as the type you used.

By VenomousX on Sunday, November 27, 2005 - 08:04 pm:

That's exactly what I meant ^^; Sorry if I sounded confusing?
